views.markdown:
Version 1.1.1 - Fixes in option for iOS 10. - Added Twitter, My Repo and Donations Icons Labels. Version 1.1.0
- Added the option to Hide the Delete Button on Apps (Code kindly provided by NeinZedd9).
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate Me (thanks so much) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Descriptions in Prefs.
- Code Improvements and for better Prefs.


Version 1.0.9
- Added the option to disable the Icon Editing Mode Gesture (thanks at sinfool for the idea).
Version 1.0.8
- Added the option to show an Alert before the Launch of the Applications (thanks for the chance to manage the Code @justrun992 and for a tip @Ziph0n).
- Added the Descriptions of the new options in the Preferences.


Version 1.0.7
- Improved and cleaned up the Code.
- Small Change in the Preferences.
Version 0.0.1-6
- Added the option to disable the Apps Launching from the SpringBoard.
- iOS 10 compatible.
Version 0.0.1-5
- Added the option to Lock the Delete Button while in Edit Mode.
- The first Tweak's option works on iOS 10.
- Optimized the Preferences.
Version 0.0.1-4
- Completely redesigned and redefined the Settings Panel of the Tweak.
Version 0.0.1-3
- Added the option to have the Icons in No Jitter Mode (it disables the Wiggling Animation).
- Added the option to Lock the First SpringBoard Page.
- Added the Extras Section in the Preferences.
- Some improvements in the Settings Panel.
- Code Cleanup.
